comments:
Stable Build 20011219

freezes, dumping the following exceptions in the console (with a long delay).

Forgot to mention I was running a JDK1.4beta3 VM.
Tried again with J9 and it did behave ok.

Fixed. There were two calls to Timer.dispose(), and the timer did not protect 
itself from a double-dispose.
